Luxury - BOOTSTRAP ADMIN TEMPLATE

Luxury is a responsive, multipurpose admin dashboard. Built on top of Bootstrap v4 framework and jQuery
and contains dozens of components and plugins!

Multiple Layouts

Luxury has Many layouts you can choose from.

Key Features

Customizability, responsiveness, built-in components, plugins. and Modern workflow tools
are just few of the features Luxury provides.

FULLY RESPONSIVE

Whether you surf using your mobile, tablet or computer Luxury looks great in all of them

CUTSOMIZABLE

Luxury allows you to customize themes, layouts and event the build process.

EASY TO INSTALL AND USE

No complex configuration required. Just download it and use it.

DOZENS OF PLUGINS

Luxury includes dozens of awesome third party plugins and libraries.

BEAUTIFUL THEMES

Use your own combination of navbar, menubar skins or choose one of ours.

BUILT ON TOP OF BOOTSTRAP

Luxury is built on top of Bootstrap 4. most popular HTML, CSS, and JS framework

FAST & RELIABLE SUPPORT

We put much effort in developing Luxury and we ready to exert more effort supporting it.

SASS

Luxury makes use of modularity of SASS for much modular and convenient CSS.

HUNDREDS OF COMPONENTS

Whether you are building Blog Management system or a dashboard for your website you will find the components you need in Luxury

TOOLING

Modern development utilizes task runners like Gulp and dependency managers like Bower and NPM. Luxury is not exception.

Hot
Stay tuned for the future updates. we include new layouts, themes and free landing pages.

Development Workflow

Utilizing Modern workflow tools is a key in the modern development workflow. We built Luxury using the following
and other awesome tools and provide you with our workflow to use in your development.
